Text:
A much better version with smaller filesize is now available at
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5399400/Looking_for_Mr_Goodbar_(1977)Richard_Gere(TVrip_Widescreen)_Kuth

IMHO, this is a superior copy to the one Fhrodo_Dendron is referencing.  I DL'd both and compared fullscreen quality using VLC on my 27" iMac, and found that the images are sharper here.

Thank you, anonymous, for this great rip!
AV 8/9 from a TV rip.  Excellent!
